overview: Sexy Diva Chrissie Chau wanna be your private 3D sweet heart! As your newly-married lovely bride, Chrissie will accompany you to an intoxicating honeymoon in France. Face-to-face, eyes-to-eyes, Chrissie will share every intimate moment with you and the 3D magic will make some of these moments even more unforgettable ── bubbles blowing in Jacuzzi, ball games on beaches, picnic on Paris' lawn... When the sun sets in Paris, Chrissie just wanna sleep tenderly in your embrace... With more than 30,000 copies of her first portrait album sold in 2009 Hong Kong Book Fair, Chrissie has aroused tremendous media coverage and is regarded as a "Social Phenomenon" among young models. Since then her tempting image of "Dream Girl" makes her one of the most promising rising star. She also extends her career in Japan as catwalk model and cover girl.
tagline: Hong Kong Superstar Model/Actress Chrissie Chau on Vacation in France for a nice 3D photo shoot.
title: Chrissie Les Vacances d' Amour
